msg_tracker_description_info: Websites and organizations use trackers to collect information about your interests and online behavior. Often, the information is used to display adverts specific to you.
msg_tracker_description_blocked: To protect your privacy, Avira Browser Safety blocks trackers.
lb_trackers_block_confirmation: Block and stop {{ name }} from tracking you?
lb_trackers_unblock_confirmation: Unblock and allow {{ name }} to track you?
lb_tracker_tooltip:
Tracker is blocked.
Click to unblock it.
lb_tracker_tooltip_blocked:
Tracker is unblocked.
Click to block it.
lb_tracker_toggle_dialog_unblock_heading: Unblocking the tracker {{ name }} will allow it to track you.
lb_tracker_toggle_dialog_block_heading: Blocking the tracker {{ name }} will stop it from tracking you.
msg_no_trackers: There are no trackers following you on the current page. If you open a website with active trackers, the complete list will be shown here.
msg_trackers_tooltip: These are all the trackers on the website you are viewing. You can block a tracker by clicking on the slider next to it. When a slider is green, that tracker is blocked and cannot track your browsing activity. Note that some trackers are allowed by default. Blocking them might result in the web page not working properly.
msg_trackers_blocked_to_date: {{ blocked_total }} trackers have been blocked to date.
msg_trackers_blocked_to_date_info:
We will automatically block 3rd party trackers on each website
so your browsing activity is not tracked.
msg_trackers_exceptions: By adding a domain name as an exception, none of the trackers on that website will be blocked. This overrides any settings above.
msg_ftu_1_text: Avira's brandnew and reliable web browser protection is already activated. Simply search and visit websites, we've got you covered.
lb_setting_tooltip_offers: Show better deals for the items you’re shopping for – from only safe websites.
lb_setting_tooltip_dnt_header: Inform websites they should not track you. If they ignore the request, ABS still blocks any trackers.
lb_setting_tooltip_block_trackers: Protect your privacy by blocking trackers by default.
lb_setting_tooltip_global_trackers: Manage the trackers that you have unblocked everywhere.
lb_setting_global_trackers_subtitle: You’ve unblocked these trackers everywhere. Keep the amount to a minimum.
lb_setting_global_trackers_none_blocked: Great. You’ve not unblocked any trackers globally.
msg_blocking_header_top_mse: Relax, Avira just saved you from a bad redirect!
msg_blocking_header_mse: Phew - that was close. It looks like your search settings were tampered with to redirect you to {{domain}}
msg_blocking_description_mse: Don't worry though - we can fix it! Just add Avira SafeSearch Plus - a free browser add-on that fixes your search settings and points out malicious websites in your search results.
msg_blocking_header_top: Avira prevents you from opening a potentially harmful website.
msg_blocking_header: Warning! This site might harm your system. It was blocked for your protection.
msg_dash_classification_exception_info_a: This site is currently NOT on your exception list. When you add an exception, the address will not be blocked when you attempt to view it. You will still see the warning on the top of the screen.
msg_dash_classification_exception_info_r: This site is currently on your exception list. If you remove the exception, the address will be blocked every time you attempt to view it.
msg_dash_classification_report_false_neg: If you think this website contains malware, phishing scams or spam, report the website as unsafe.
msg_dash_classification_mse_description:
This search engine has a bad reputation.
It is frequently associated with potentially unwanted applications and malware, and is therefore distrusted.
lb_click_to_disable_all_trackers: Click the box to disable all trackers.
msg_tour_classification_feature: Now you can see at a glance whether a website is safe. A green checkmark means that no threats have been identified. However, if you encounter a malicious website, you will receive a warning.
msg_tour_trackers:
Monitor your online privacy. Avira Browser Safety blocks trackers trying to profile you.
You will see a blue icon when trackers have not been blocked. This may occur when they are needed for the site to function properly.
msg_tour_how_to_edit: You can control each tracker individually. If the slider next to a tracker is gray, the tracker is active and tracking you. To block this tracker, move the slider to the right. The slider turns green and the tracker is being blocked.
msg_tour_feedback: Found a bug? Got an idea? Thank you for your feedback!
msg_ftu_offers_desc: Avira Price Comparison gives you our best deals from merchants you can trust on products you want. No personal data is collected. Avira Price Comparison can be turned off in the settings of Avira Browser Safety.
msg_dnt_switched_off_for_offers: To offer you the best shopping deal, trackers are temporarily allowed.
msg_dash_pua_warning: The download contains Potentially Unwanted Applications
msg_dash_pua_page_warning: Downloads from this website might contain Potentially Unwanted Applications (PUAs).
msg_dash_pua_suggestions: Avira recommends that you download {{product_name}} from one of these trusted sources:
msg_mse_bar_warning: Your search engine settings were possibly tampered with.
lb_unsafe_content_bar_warning: Avira Browser Safety prevented unsafe content from loading on this webpage.
msg_dash_unsafe_content_warning: Avira Browser Safety prevented unsafe content from loading on this webpage.
msg_dash_unsafe_content_risk_no_exceptio: For safety, you are recommended to keep the content blocked.
msg_dash_unsafe_content_risk_exception: For safety, you are recommended to block the unsafe content by removing the exception.
msg_category_unknown: No information was found for this website.
msg_category_malware_sub: Malware websites infect your device and can include viruses, worms, spyware, and Trojans.
msg_category_phishing_sub: Phishing websites trick you into revealing your personal information, such as passwords and bank account information.
msg_category_spam_sub: Spam websites get your email address so they can send you adverts by email.
msg_category_pua: The download contains Potentially Unwanted Applications
msg_category_pua2_sub: Potentially Unwanted Applications (PUAs) exhibit behavior or contain features that are considered undesirable by users.
msg_category_mse_sub: This search engine is distrusted because malware and Potentially Unwanted Applications are known to redirect traffic to it.
msg_category_unsafe_content_sub: Webpages load unsafe content if compromised or third-party content is hacked or intentionally harmful.
